name: Healthcare & Diagnostics
description: Precision labeling for blood collection tubes, diagnostic kits, specimen containers, and medical devices. Our labels withstand sterilization, refrigeration, and chemical exposure while maintaining barcode scannability.
features: Blood vial & specimen labels,Autoclave-safe sterilization labels,Medical device tracking barcodes,Patient identification wristbands

name: Pharmaceuticals
description: Compliant pharmaceutical labeling for drug packaging, tablet bottles, syringes, and clinical trial products. Our labels meet FDA and regulatory standards with tamper-evident and serialization features.
features: Drug bottle & carton labels,Tamper-evident security seals,Serialization & track-and-trace,Clinical trial labeling

name: Cosmetics & Personal Care
description: Elegant and durable labels for cosmetics, skincare, haircare, and personal care products. Waterproof and oil-resistant finishes that maintain brand aesthetics even in humid bathroom environments.
features: Waterproof cosmetic labels,Oil & moisture resistant,Premium metallic finishes,Skincare & haircare branding

name: Food & Beverage
description: Food-safe labeling solutions for packaged foods, beverages, frozen items, and fresh produce. Our labels comply with FSSAI regulations and withstand refrigeration, moisture, and handling.
features: FSSAI compliant food labels,Freezer-grade adhesive labels,Nutrition facts & MRP printing,Beverage bottle wrap labels

name: Chemical Industry
description: GHS-compliant chemical labeling for drums, containers, and hazardous material packaging. Our labels resist chemical exposure, solvents, and extreme temperatures for safe identification.
features: GHS hazard warning labels,Chemical-resistant materials,Drum & container labeling,Safety data sheet labels

name: Textile & Garments
description: Wash-care labels, brand tags, size labels, and composition labels for garments and textiles. Printed on taffeta and satin materials that survive 50+ wash cycles without fading.
features: Wash-care instruction labels,Fabric composition tags,Brand & size labels,Taffeta & satin materials

name: Automobile
description: Durable VIN labels, under-hood tracking stickers, and parts identification for the automotive industry. Our labels withstand extreme heat, oil, and UV exposure in engine compartments.
features: VIN & chassis number labels,Under-hood heat resistant,Parts tracking barcodes,Tire & component stickers

name: Engineering & Manufacturing
description: Industrial-grade labels for machinery, equipment, and manufactured goods. Designed for asset tracking, quality control, calibration stickers, and warehouse inventory management.
features: Asset tracking labels,Quality control stickers,Calibration & inspection tags,Warehouse inventory labels

name: Electronics & IT
description: Static-safe and heat-resistant labels for PCBs, electronic components, IT hardware, and cable management. Our labels endure soldering temperatures and provide clear asset identification.
features: PCB & component labels,Heat-resistant soldering labels,IT asset tracking tags,Cable & wire identification

name: Courier & Logistics
description: High-volume shipping labels, AWB stickers, and logistics barcodes for courier and warehousing operations. Designed for fast printing on thermal printers with excellent scan rates.
features: Shipping & AWB labels,Warehouse rack labels,Route & sorting barcodes,E-commerce packing slips

name: Retail & E-commerce
description: Retail-ready labels including price tags, shelf labels, promotional stickers, and branded packaging labels. Eye-catching designs that boost shelf appeal and brand recognition.
features: Price & MRP tags,Shelf & rack labels,Promotional stickers,Branded packaging labels

name: Jewellery & Luxury Retail
description: Miniature barcode labels and elegant tags for jewellery, watches, and luxury items. Our ultra-small labels fit rings, pendants, and bangles with clear print and premium gold/silver finishes.
features: Tiny jewellery barcode tags,Gold & silver foil labels,Tamper-proof price tags,Luxury brand packaging

name: Agriculture & Horticulture
description: Weather-resistant labels for fertilizers, pesticides, seeds, and agricultural equipment. UV-stable printing ensures outdoor readability while adhesives withstand moisture and temperature variations.
features: Fertilizer & pesticide labels,UV-stable outdoor printing,Seed packaging labels,Equipment tracking tags
